overview: Andrew graduated with a double major in Computer Engineering and Computer Science from the University of Wisconsin-Madison. While earning his degree, Andrew received several merit awards for his academic achievements. Andrew has worked at Microsoft and Avid, and today he serves as the CTO of PerBlue. From a young age, Andrew took great enjoyment in crafting games and loves creating new and unique games. This deep-rooted passion is evident in his personal life, where he spends his free time playing board, card and table top games. PerBlue and Parallel Kingdom are products of his creativity and passion.
